alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:56AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Jewell, southern Nuckolls and southeastern Webster Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 356 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Guide Rock to near Bostwick to 6 miles northeast of Burr Oak. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Superior around 410 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Nora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
